content: असम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Uneven, odd (as a number); असमशीलाः खलु मृगाः <ls>Bv. 1. 2</ls> mean, contemptible. {@--2@} Unequal (in space, number or dignity); असमैः समीयमानः <ls>Pt. 1. 74.</ls> {@--3@} Unequalled, matchless, unsurpassed; समवतारसमैरसमैस्तटैः <ls>Ki. 5. 7</ls>; वाद्यविशेषाणामसमः श्रोता <ls>K. 12</ls>; <ls>Ms. 10. 73.</ls> {@--4@} Uneven, not level (as ground). --मः <ab>N.</ab> of Buddha.
